snippet.title: Master Your Golf Game At This Hidden Gem Hotel

snippet.title: Can A Bigger Hole Save Golf? Top PGA Tour Pros Follow The Masters With Bold Experiment
snippet.description: Much has been written in recent years about the slow, steady decline of golf as a participant sport in this country. The usual rationale for the lack of new participants in the game follows a two-tiered thought process. First, it is argued that golf takes too much time in an [...] read »

snippet.title: New Scottish Luxury Lodgings And World-Class Courses Woo Golf Travelers
snippet.description: With the addition of the two new world class courses nearby, the area suddenly warrants its own week-long golf visit. Fortunately for golfers, there is now an equally impressive place to stay, Links House. read »

snippet.title: Jordan Spieth's Scintillating Performance Shines Spotlight On Under Armour Golf At The Masters
snippet.description: Tiger Woods' absence and Rory McIlroy's sub-par performance has left Nike in the dark at The Masters, but rival Under Armour is flourishing with golfer Jordan Spieth's scintillating success through 3 rounds of the Tournament.

snippet.title: How Mizuno Golf Scores With Average Joes In Addition To Masters Contenders
snippet.description: VideoAs the attention of the golfing world focuses on stories coming from this week’s Masters Tournament, Mizuno Golf is also paying attention to the millions of average golfers and their stories. snippet.title: Stay At This Bermuda Hotel And Boost Your Golf Game At The Same Time
snippet.description: Bermuda is a beautiful island to visit anyway, but it's nirvana if you want to play golf--especially if you stay at Rosewood Tucker's Point. read »

snippet.title: Golf: The Game Of Life
snippet.description: “Golf is the closest game to the game we call life. You get bad breaks from good shots; you get good breaks from bad shots, but you have to play the ball where it lies.” - Bobby Jones “One of the most fascinating things about golf is how it reflects the [...] read »

snippet.title: Donald Trump Reopens The Blue Monster At Doral And Answers Questions About His Role In Golf
snippet.description: Donald Trump golf course in Doral has gone through a major renovation in time for the World Golf Championships. What's next for the Donald?
